mapper.select: SELECT t.region_id regionId, IFNULL(SUM(t.request_amount),0) AS requestAmount, t1.`name` regionName FROM pap_t_regionflow_hour t left join pap_t_region t1 on t1.`id` = t.`region_id` WHERE t.datetime BETWEEN #{beginTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t.region_id ORDER BY SUM(t.request_amount) DESC LIMIT #{limitNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}
